name: Rockson
description:
Take control of Rockson, the original rolling stone. He's the reason music rocks, and why there's rock music. Well, not really... but Rocky Balboa did cite Rockson's determination as the pure inspiration he needed to climb those stairs in Philadelphia.

Please enjoy this pun-filled adventure and help Rockson make it back to solid ground above the sea with the help of SO MANY BUBBLES!!!

[little tip for the game: there are just 2 keys on the keyboard needed for him to move]
